A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Last Jedi took risks and made choices that most movies with such an established history don't have the confidence to do. This has resulted in one of the more\, if not the most compelling installment in the greatest series to grace the silver screen. 

As a lifelong fan\, it was amazing to see something that surprised at every turn. It evoked the same feeling as getting to see the universe for the first time.

It brings the magic. It brings it hard.
